eta_utility.eta_x.eta_x moduleÔÉÅ

class eta_utility.eta_x.eta_x.ETAx(root_path: str | os.PathLike, config_name: str, config_overwrite: Mapping[str, Any] | None = None, relpath_config: str | os.PathLike = 'config/')[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

Initialize an optimization model and provide interfaces for optimization, learning and execution (play).

Parameters:

  • root_path ‚Äì Root path of the eta_x application (the configuration will be interpreted relative to this).

  • config_name ‚Äì Name of configuration .ini file in configuration directory (should be JSON format).

  • config_overwrite ‚Äì Dictionary to overwrite selected configurations.

  • relpath_config ‚Äì Relative path to configuration file, starting from root path.

path_configÔÉÅ

Path to the configuration file.

config: ConfigOptÔÉÅ

ConfigOpt object for the optimization run.

config_run: ConfigOptRun | NoneÔÉÅ

Configuration for an optimization run.

environments: VecEnv | VecNormalize | NoneÔÉÅ

The vectorized environments.

interaction_env: VecEnv | NoneÔÉÅ

Vectorized interaction environments.

model: BaseAlgorithm | NoneÔÉÅ

The model or algorithm.

prepare_environments_models(series_name: str | None, run_name: str | None, run_description: str = '', reset: bool = False, training: bool = False) → Generator[source]ÔÉÅ
prepare_run(series_name: str, run_name: str, run_description: str = '') → None[source]ÔÉÅ

Prepare the learn and play methods by reading configuration, creating results folders and the model.

Parameters:

  • series_name ‚Äì Name for a series of runs.

  • run_name ‚Äì Name for a specific run.

  • run_description ‚Äì Description for a specific run.

prepare_model(reset: bool = False) → None[source]ÔÉÅ

Check for existing model and load it or back it up and create a new model.

Parameters:

reset ‚Äì Flag to determine whether an existing model should be reset.

prepare_environments(training: bool = True) → Generator[source]ÔÉÅ

Context manager which prepares the environments and closes them after it exits.

Parameters:

training ‚Äì Should preparation be done for training (alternative: playing)?

learn(series_name: str | None = None, run_name: str | None = None, run_description: str = '', reset: bool = False, callbacks: MaybeCallback = None) → None[source]ÔÉÅ

Start the learning job for an agent with the specified environment.

Parameters:

  • series_name ‚Äì Name for a series of runs.

  • run_name ‚Äì Name for a specific run.

  • run_description ‚Äì Description for a specific run.

  • reset ‚Äì Indication whether possibly existing models should be reset. Learning will be continued if model exists and reset is false.

  • callbacks ‚Äì Provide additional callbacks to send to the model.learn() call.

play(series_name: str | None = None, run_name: str | None = None, run_description: str = '') → None[source]ÔÉÅ

Play with previously learned agent model in environment.

Parameters:

  • series_name ‚Äì Name for a series of runs.

  • run_name ‚Äì Name for a specific run.

  • run_description ‚Äì Description for a specific run.
